summary: Implementing UI/UX updates to the Phase 10 round submission screen (phase completion checkbox/label placement and visibility behavior).

Adjust the layout on the Phase 10 round submission screen so the "Phase complete" label/checkbox control is right-justified to the right side of the player's score entry box (in the same row as the score input).
